title: Exploring your growth
creator_credit: Churchill-Wexler Film Productions and Heath Elementary Science
brief_description: Uses simple animation and photomicrography to explore the process that makes a person grow. Explains how food is digested in the mouth, stomach, and intestine; how the digested food is carried by the blood from the intestine to the cells of the body; and how food allows cells to grow and divide, causing growth.
